txt.en: This shard of obsidian appears to be a fragment of some strange talisman. It may be that the talisman is the source of the evil dwelling within Byrgenstow, the burial cave of the WÃ³dfen.\n\nPerhaps the other fragments are locked away in chests within Byrgenstow.
You found a fragment of a strange obsidian talisman upon the corpse of a draug.
You should break the locks on the chests within Byrgenstow and search them to find more fragments of the talisman.
Destroy the talisman at the source of its creation within Byrgenstow

You have collected all of the fragments of the talisman. The evil it emanates is terrible. Perhaps it can be destroyed at the place of its origin.\n\nYou should find the source of the talisman within Byrgenstow. It is very likely in the deepest chambers.
